translations: 先发制人，预先阻止；垄断，屯积；领先；占先一步

sentences.sentence: Large numbers of police were in the square to forestall any demonstrations.
sentences.translation: 大批警察在广场上以预先阻止任何游行示威。

sentences.sentence: Try to anticipate what your child will do and forestall problems.
sentences.translation: 尽量预见你的孩子会干什么，并预先阻止问题发生。

sentences.sentence: To forestall is better than to amend.; Prevention is better than cure.
sentences.translation: 与其补救于已然，不如防范于未然。
